summary: Grove v1.1.0 brings powerful new tools for creators and developers! This release introduces the Glimpse rewrite for smarter content suggestions, universal Shelves to beautifully organize links, and the Amber SDK for unified storage. We've also made significant improvements to mobile layouts, authentication, and our underlying infrastructure while expanding our documentation with deep dives and safari journals. It's all about giving you more control, better performance, and a smoother editing experience across your sites.
